page.title: 04TRADE
page.content: Most of Kineton's buisnesses are family concerns, some of them long established. The{shops}are owner occupied and very small but attract many customers from surrounding villages thus retaining the 'market town' status. There are two grocers, two general shops, a greengrocer, newsagent, butcher, two fashion shops, a delicatessan, fish and chip fryer and two hairdressers, a hardware merchant, drug store, florist, betting shop and antique shop. The shops provide limited employment for local people.
